incoming-ip.help: Accept incoming FTP requests from this IP address. An interface must have this IP address.
incoming-ip.name: incoming-ip

incoming-port.help: Accept incoming FTP requests on one or more ports.
incoming-port.name: incoming-port

outgoing-ip.help: Outgoing FTP requests will leave from this IP address. An interface must have this IP address.
outgoing-ip.name: outgoing-ip

sec-default-action.help: Accept or deny explicit FTP proxy sessions when no FTP proxy firewall policy exists.
sec-default-action.name: sec-default-action

options.help: Accept requests. All explicit FTP proxy traffic is accepted whether there is an explicit FTP proxy policy or not
options.name: accept

options.help: Deny requests unless there is a matching explicit FTP proxy policy.
options.name: deny

ssl-algorithm.help: Relative strength of encryption algorithms accepted in negotiation.
ssl-algorithm.name: ssl-algorithm

options.help: High encryption. Allow only AES and ChaCha
options.name: high

options.help: Medium encryption. Allow AES, ChaCha, 3DES, and RC4.
options.name: medium

options.help: Low encryption. Allow AES, ChaCha, 3DES, RC4, and DES.
options.name: low

ssl-cert.help: Name of certificate for SSL connections to this server (default = "Fortinet_CA_SSL").
ssl-cert.name: ssl-cert

ssl-dh-bits.help: Bit-size of Diffie-Hellman (DH) prime used in DHE-RSA negotiation (default = 2048).
ssl-dh-bits.name: ssl-dh-bits
